summary: Personal finance web app (financewiseai-acv.caffeine.xyz) to be updated with working Internet Identity sign-up/login, correct per-user account isolation, fixed goals deletion with confirmation, unified cross-page data flow, and an AI assistant that uses all user financial data to answer saving/investing/expense-control questions.
architectural_notes: Auth platform constraint: Internet Computer supports Internet Identity (not traditional email/password auth); implement Sign Up/Login via Internet Identity.
known_issues: Sign Up button currently results in 'not found' (broken Internet Identity sign-up flow).
Different logins/emails are incorrectly showing the same account (user isolation bug).
Goals added on Goals page are not deleting (delete action broken).

existing_features.title: Fix the broken Sign Up navigation so clicking “Sign Up Free” does not go to a Not Found route and instead takes the user to a working Internet Identity authentication screen.

Resolve account isolation so different Internet Identity users (different principals) always see different profiles, goals, transactions, and dashboard data; switching identities must not show the previous user’s data.
Fix the Goals page delete flow so goals are actually removed from storage and the UI, and replace the browser confirm() with an in-app confirmation popup shown only for goal deletion.

Ensure cross-page data consistency: when the user adds/updates/deletes transactions or goals, all relevant pages (Dashboard, Transactions, Goals, Analytics, and the AI assistant context) reflect the changes correctly via shared queries and proper invalidation/refetch.

Upgrade the AI assistant so its answers are based on the authenticated user’s actual app data (at minimum: transactions, balance, and savings goals) and it can answer saving, investing, and expense-control questions using those numbers from the dashboard.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix broken Sign Up flow (Internet Identity): Sign Up button currently leads to 'not found'; ensure sign-up/login works end-to-end
Fix account isolation: different Internet Identity / login emails should map to different user accounts (currently showing same account)
Goals page: fix delete-goal functionality and add confirmation popup for goal deletion only
Connect data across all pages so user financial data is consistent and shared throughout the app
Upgrade AI assistant to use aggregated user data from all pages (dashboard/expenses/goals/savings) to provide personalized analysis and guidance (saving, investing, expense control)
